compounddef.innerclass: Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis::has_execution_space< T, typename std::is_same< typename T::execution_space, void >::type >
Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis::has_value_type< F, typename std::is_same< typename F::value_type, void >::type >
Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis::has_work_tag< P, typename std::is_same< typename P::work_tag, void >::type >

enumvalue.name: DEDUCED
enumvalue.initializer: = !std::is_same<PatternInterface, REDUCE>::value ? DISABLE : (std::is_same<Tag, void>::value ? (candidate_is_array ? NO_TAG_IS_ARRAY : NO_TAG_NOT_ARRAY) : (candidate_is_array ? HAS_TAG_IS_ARRAY : HAS_TAG_NOT_ARRAY))

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::FOR = FunctorPatternInterface::FOR
memberdef.name: FOR

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::REDUCE = FunctorPatternInterface::REDUCE
memberdef.name: REDUCE

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::SCAN = FunctorPatternInterface::SCAN
memberdef.name: SCAN

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::Tag = typename has_work_tag<>::type
memberdef.name: Tag

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::WTag = typename has_work_tag<>::wtag
memberdef.name: WTag

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::policy_has_space = has_execution_space<Policy>
memberdef.name: policy_has_space

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::functor_has_space = has_execution_space<Functor>
memberdef.name: functor_has_space

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::candidate_type = typename deduce_value_type<Functor>::type
memberdef.name: candidate_type

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::ValueType = typename std::conditional<candidate_is_void, VOID, value_type>::type
memberdef.name: ValueType

memberdef.type: typename std::conditional< functor_has_space::value, typename functor_has_space::type, typename std::conditional< policy_has_space::value, typename policy_has_space::type, Kokkos::DefaultExecutionSpace >::type >::type
memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::execution_space = typename std::conditional< functor_has_space::value, typename functor_has_space::type, typename std::conditional<policy_has_space::value, typename policy_has_space::type, Kokkos::DefaultExecutionSpace>::type>::type
memberdef.name: execution_space

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::value_type = typename std::remove_extent<candidate_type>::type
memberdef.name: value_type

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::pointer_type = typename std::conditional<candidate_is_void, void, ValueType*>::type
memberdef.name: pointer_type

memberdef.type: typename std::conditional< candidate_is_array, ValueType *, typename std::conditional<!candidate_is_void, ValueType &, void >::type >::type
memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::reference_type = typename std::conditional< candidate_is_array, ValueType*, typename std::conditional<!candidate_is_void, ValueType&, void>::type>::type
memberdef.name: reference_type

memberdef.definition: struct DeduceTeamShmem< F, typename std::enable_if< 0< sizeof(&F::shmem_size)>::type > { enum :bool { value=true };static size_t team_shmem_size(F const *const f, int team_size) { return f-> Kokkos::Impl::FunctorAnalysis< PatternInterface, Policy, Functor >::shmem_size

briefdescription.para: Query Functor and execution policy argument tag for value type.

detaileddescription.para: If 'value_type' is not explicitly declared in the functor then attempt to deduce the type from FunctorType::operator() interface used by the pattern and policy.
For the REDUCE pattern generate a Reducer and finalization function derived from what is available within the functor.
